TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DuplexChannelFactory`1<TChannel> extends System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory`1<!TChannel>
Public Class DuplexChannelFactory(Of TChannel) Inherits ChannelFactory(Of TChannel)
generic <typename TChannel> public ref class DuplexChannelFactory : System::ServiceModel::ChannelFactory<TChannel>

typeparam.name: TChannel
typeparam.span: 由通道工厂生成的通道类型。

span.span: The type of channel produced by the channel factory.

summary.span: 提供创建和管理不同类型的双工通道的方式，客户端使用这些通道在服务终结点发送和接收消息。

span.span: Provides the means to create and manage duplex channels of different types that are used by clients to send and receive messages to and from service endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双工通道使得客户端和服务器可以独立地相互通信，这样双方都可以启动对另一方的调用。A duplex channel allows clients and servers to communicate with each other independently so that either can initiate calls to the other. 双工服务可以将消息发送至客户端终结点，从而提供类似事件的行为。A duplex service can send messages to the client endpoint, providing event-like behavior. 当客户端与服务建立会话并为服务提供可用来将消息发送回客户端的通道时，就会发生双工通信。Duplex communication occurs when a client establishes a session with a service and provides the service with a channel on which the service can send messages back to the client. 有多种不同的 方法可用于创建这些双工通道。The various methods are used to create these duplex channels. 双工消息模式是可供 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 服务使用的三种消息模式之一。The duplex message pattern is one of three message patterns available to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] services. 另外两种消息模式是单向模式和请求-答复模式。The other two message patterns are one-way and request-reply. 允许客户端连接回服务的双工服务的常规讨论，请参阅[双工服务](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md)。For a general discussion of duplex services that allow clients to connect back to the service, see [Duplex Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/duplex-services.md). 有关的概述和讨论的步骤涉及书写[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]客户端应用程序使用通道工厂，请参阅[如何： 使用 ChannelFactory](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-channelfactory.md)。For an outline and discussion of the steps involved in writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client application using a channel factory, see [How to: Use the ChannelFactory](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-the-channelfactory.md). 有关过程描述如何创建[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]客户端的客户端类中实现回调接口来访问服务使用双工消息传递模式，请参阅[如何： 使用双工协定访问服务](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-access-services-with-a-duplex-contract.md)。For a procedure describing how to create a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client in a client class that implements the callback interface to access a service that uses a duplex messaging pattern, see [How to: Access Services with a Duplex Contract](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-access-services-with-a-duplex-contract.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建通道工厂并用它来创建和管理通道。The following sample shows how to create a channel factory and use it to create and manage channels. [!code-csharp[S_CustomAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_customauthentication/cs/instance.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数以编程方式（而不是使用应用程序配置文件）传递实现目标服务的回调协定的对象。Use this constructor to pass an object that implements the callback contract for the target service programmatically rather than by using an application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数以编程方式传递实现目标服务地址信息的回调协定的实例上下文对象，并以编程方式传入地址信息，同时通过客户端应用程序配置文件确定剩余目标终结点信息。Use this constructor to pass an instance context object that implements the callback contract for the target service address information programmatically, pass in the address information programmatically, and determine the remaining target endpoint information from the client application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数以编程方式（而不是使用应用程序配置文件）传递实现目标服务回调协定的服务对象，并传入绑定和地址信息。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and pass in the binding and address information programmatically rather than using an application configuration file.

span.span: or or is .

MemberSignature.Value: public DuplexChannelFactory (object callbackObject, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string remoteAddress);

public: DuplexChannelFactory(System::Object ^ callbackObject, System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ binding, System::String ^ remoteAddress);
public DuplexChannelFactory (object callbackInstance, System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string remoteAddress);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object callbackInstance, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding binding, string remoteAddress) cil managed
public: DuplexChannelFactory(System::Object ^ callbackInstance, System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ binding, System::String ^ remoteAddress);

param.name: binding
param.span: 用于通过工厂生成的通道连接至服务的 。

span.span: The used to connect to the service by channels produced by the factory.

param.name: remoteAddress
param.span: 提供服务位置的远程地址。

span.span: The remote address that provides the location of the service.

summary.span: 使用指定的回调对象、绑定和远程地址初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified callback object, binding, and remote address.
or or is .

public: DuplexChannelFactory(System::Object ^ callbackInstance, System::String ^ endpointConfigurationName, System::ServiceModel::EndpointAddress ^ remoteAddress);

param.name: endpointConfigurationName
param.span: 用于终结点配置的名称。

span.span: The name used for the endpoint configuration.

param.name: remoteAddress
param.span: 提供服务位置的 。

span.span: The that provides the location of the service.

summary.span: 使用实现回调协定的对象以及指定配置和终结点地址初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an object that implements the callback contract, and a specified configuration and endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数以编程方式传递实现目标服务回调协定的服务对象以及传入地址信息，并通过客户端应用程序配置文件确定剩余目标终结点信息。Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service, pass in the address information programmatically, and determine the remaining target endpoint information from the client application configuration file.

span.span: or or is .

summary.span: 创建一个指定类型的双工通道，以连接到指定的终结点地址。

span.span: Creates a duplex channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address.

param.span: ，客户端用以侦听来自所连接服务的消息。

span.span: The that the client uses to listen for messages from the connected service.

summary.span: 在服务和客户端上的回调实例之间创建双工通道。

span.span: Creates a duplex channel between a service and a callback instance on the client.

returns.span: 位于客户端和服务之间类型为 （工厂的泛型参数）的双工通道。

span.span: A duplex channel of type , the generic parameter for the factory, between the client and service.
